item.title: Fear of Flying - Turbulence
item.description: Many nervous flyers and people who are new to Aviation will be scared of turbulence. But, turbulence is nothing to worry about. In fact, turbulence is a mere annoyance to flight Crew and Passengers, as it always seems to start when we are trying to drink coffee or fill out paperwork! WHAT IS TURBULENCE? Turbulence is a dreaded experience for many fearful flyers, and is the source of the majority of anxiety amongst airline passengers
